projects.name: FAPG Transparency Portal
projects.description: Website and API developed for the FAPG Foundation, focusing on public transparency of projects and research initiatives. Users can create, edit, and manage projects, providing a clear overview of foundation activities.

projects.name: Service Desk
projects.description: A system for students to report issues and request assistance, making it easier for faculty and staff to track and resolve problems. Provides a streamlined communication process for problem reporting and feedback.

projects.name: API of CRUD NoSQL
projects.description: An API inspired by the Mercado Livre database architecture, designed for inserting, updating, and managing data while maintaining ACID properties in a NoSQL environment.

projects.name: API for JWT Authentication
projects.description: A secure authentication API using JWT for user authentication and authorization, ensuring robust access control for sensitive information.

projects.name: Library System
projects.description: API for managing a library system, enabling users to create new books, manage loans, and handle return dates. Facilitates efficient tracking of book borrowings and returns.

projects.name: PC Media Controller
projects.description: An application designed to control media playback on a computer. It allows users to adjust volume, play/pause, and navigate through videos using keyboard shortcuts.

projects.name: JWT Authentication Application
projects.description: A web application providing user authentication through JWT, enabling secure login and access management across different user roles.

projects.name: OrbitChat
projects.description: A social media platform inspired by Twitter, where users can create posts, follow other users, like posts, and repost content, offering a dynamic and interactive user experience.
